data.eml:eml: Three new species of cockroach genus Symploce Hebard, 1916 (Blattodea, Ectobiidae, Blattellinae) with redescriptions of two known species based on types from Mainland China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Zongqing, Che, Yanli (2013): Three new species of cockroach genus Symploce Hebard, 1916 (Blattodea, Ectobiidae, Blattellinae) with redescriptions of two known species based on types from Mainland China. ZooKeys 337: 1-18, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.337.5770, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.337.5770
